name: The Kick Dip
description: Looking to spice things up? Loaded with flavor, this will keep guests happily munching as long as it lasts. Thanks to Lisa Hiscock, a Consultant in Newfoundland, CA, this kick’n dip has got game.
preparation: In a large bowl, whisk together mayonnaise, sour cream, Ranch Dip Mix, Guacamole Dip Mix, Nacho Cheese Dip Mix and Poco Picante Salsa Mix.
Serve with your favourite veggies and dippables!
tips: Prep ahead! Cover and refrigerate dip up to 5 days. Seasonings “bloom” as the dip sits. Stir in hot water or milk to thin, if needed.
For a lighter option, substitute Greek yogurt for sour cream.

products.name: Creamy Ranch Dip Mix
summary: Go beyond your classic ranch dressing and create spreads, dips, or seasonings with this versatile blend!

products.name: Guacamole Dip Mix
summary: An all-natural blend of sweet peppers, garlic, and chilies comes together to create the perfect guacamole––minus the sodium and additives!

products.name: Nacho Cheese Dip Mix
summary: A delicious blend of bold chili with real Parmesan makes for a creamy nacho cheese dip or seasoning.

products.name: Poco Picante Salsa Mix
summary: The vibrant flavours of cayenne, chillies, and garlic come together to create a zesty salsa with a medium kick.
